titleStmt.title: Reflections upon two scurrilous libels, called Speculum crape-gownorum by a lay-man.
titleStmt.author: Banckes, Matthew.

notesStmt.note: The Speculum is attributed to John Phillips and erroneously ascribed to Daniel. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
